TopicTitle: Who plays From the depths here?.

Articles.Content: I do! I started playing more than a year ago and took a looong break, but I've picked it up again. There's a land campaign now, and I'm having tons of fun designing tanks. I would upload some screenshots but I'm not at home right now, therefore I can't reach my main computer. I'll get home on Monday, so expect some screenshots on that day.
I have tinkered for a few hours but still haven't a clue what I'm doing.
nice title around the minecraft concept, following the progress

I do.

I just finished my new (quite big) boat featuring a large armor piercing 500mm railgun, a conventional 500mm cannon, two dual barrels 250mm turrets and two AA turrets.
It also come with six heat seeking missiles, six radar guided missiles, three heat and radar countermeasure, two sonar countermeasure and a powerful LAMS and the ability to reach speeds above 14 m/s.

Seem like KSP have conditioned me to build unnecessary large and powerful designs in all games allowing you to build anything  
 

(especially since I plan to add a few torpedoes and mines just to be sure...)

Yay overpaid for a steam voucher(they did not have a £15 one and a sale was on at my game(preordered D2 while we were there so £5 more was spent i stayed strong there were games that i wanted)) so £25 was spent there. So now i can get it.(and have spare cash)

I've had it for quite a while (like a year or 2), but for almost all of that time, it hasn't worked on my PC due to my GPU being quite terrible, though I have played it a bit now that I have a better GPU.

On 4/16/2017 at 7:09 PM, Vanamonde said:

I have tinkered for a few hours but still haven't a clue what I'm doing. 

ive tinkered round with it since october and i still havent a clue what im doing (well most of the time my only expertee in that game is steam ships)
My weapons systems all basically consist of this, but with missiles.
